short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A hero standing tall under the heavens, undefeated on the battlefield.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your new tab into a powerful and serene experience with the Samurai Background extension. Featuring a captivating samurai warrior set against a striking backdrop, this extension immerses you in the world of ancient Japan every time you open a new tab.
